articles.title: A Scalable Project Structure for Next.js
articles.excerpt: Next.js and React are not opinionated. Much is left to us to figure out - and without rules, our code can get wild pretty quickly. In this post I explain the rationale behind the way I structure my Next.js projects for small and medium-sized apps

articles.title: Generating automatic banners for your Blog
articles.excerpt: Say no to custom banners. This post will teach you how to generate automatic banners for your articles using Next.js, SVG and Sharp

articles.title: A Reactive Enum with Typescript and RxJs
articles.excerpt: Typescript's template literals' types allow us to generate dynamic and typed code, together. In this article, I want to show how we can build a dynamic reactive enum with TS and RxJS

articles.title: Caching RxJS streams into Web Storage
articles.excerpt: In this article I will introduce you to a simple utility that allows you to cache RxJS streams in memory or the browser's storage
